ygData.messageBody:
*SPOILER (sort of)*

Maesyn Trueshot sends you on a quest to get 4 materials to bring back to him, and he gives you the Trueshot STAFF, which you must cobine with more items to make the BOW. I'll spare the details since it's on most spoiler sites.

Slig of Povar

>>> "kale usi" <kaleusi@...> 07/19 11:09 AM >>>
From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>




>From: "Michael Buck" <lugh@...>
>
> If you thought about it there really is no point to a magical bow. The
>arrow is the thing that actually hits the monster. Now if the bow was a
>magic bow and it did something such as make it so you never missed your
>target then that would be a very usful magic bow but other than that I dont
>beleive that just a plain magic bow has any use, the arrow is the thing
>that needs to be magic.
>
> And to answer your second question no I cant make a Trueshot >Longbow,
>but I have seen one person selling them on my server. He >said you do have
>to be a very high level fletcher to make one though. >I will see if I can
>find him again.
>
>Another thought I had was what if we could have our arrows do >something
>useful other than just pull monsters. What if we could make >an arrow that
>also poisoned the monster, diseased it, or something to >that effect. I
>think thats something we should all look into.
>
>Amrosse
>Rallos Zek
>

I'm probably wrong - but I thought you got the Trueshot Longbow from a
quest? Or do you just get the components to make one from the quest?
